A '''[[texture pack]]''' is the mechanism used to customize textures in ''Java Edition'' prior to 1.6.1 and in ''Xbox 360 Edition'' prior to TU13.

'''Texture pack''' may also refer to:

* [[Resource pack]], the current mechanism used to customize textures and other assets {{in|je|be}}
* [[Texture pack (downloadable content)]], downloadable replacement textures in Bedrock and Legacy Console editions
* [[Mash-up pack]], used in Legacy Console Edition, Bedrock Edition & New Nintendo 3DS Edition as the equivalent of a resource pack
* [[Skin pack]], downloadable replacement textures for player skins in Bedrock and Legacy Console editions
* [[Add-on]], the mechanism used to customize textures and player skins in Bedrock and Legacy Console editions
